name: MUMUBIT TOKEN
description: Mumubit is an innovative multi-chain IDO platform, supporting third-party projects and building its own ecosystem, including mini Telegram games. Founded in 2021 in Toronto, it offers tools for blockchain projects, such as a fundraising platform, a user growth platform, and a Node Builder System. At its core is the MCTP token, powering transactions, rewards, and governance. Mumubitâ€™s Node Builder System includes Validator, Influencer, and Contributor nodes, each with specific roles. Upcoming projects include a decentralized exchange (DEX) and games that integrate MCTP for immersive play and ecosystem engagement.
